content: work feather 3 slip_stitch in next st sweet oddity art 4 here is a video that might help https //www youtube com/watch v=alj0kywmdeo right wing right wing continued starting with color a change to color b 1 make 6 single_crochet into a magic_ring= 6 work feather 1 slip_stitch in next st 2 increase in each st around= 12 change to color c 3 single_crochet increase x 6= 18 work feather 1 slip_stitch in next st 4 2 single_crochet increase x 6= 24 change to color a 5 3 single_crochet increase x 6= 30 work a single_crochet in the same st work 2 6 single_crochet in each st around more single_crochet fold the wings in half and single_crochet them closed f/o and leave a long tail for do not f/o you are starting the feathers sewing *feather 1 chain 4 slip_stitch in 2nd chain from hook and across* *feather 2 chain 6 slip_stitch in 2nd chain from hook and across* *feather 3 chain 8 slip_stitch in 2nd chain from hook and across* 7 change to color b f/o color a work feather 3 slip_stitch in next st change to color c work feather 3 slip_stitch in next st change to color b work feather 3 slip_stitch in next st change to color c work feather 3 slip_stitch in next st change to color b work feather 3 slip_stitch in next st change to color c work feather 3 slip_stitch in next st change to color b work feather 2 slip_stitch in next st change to color c work feather 2 slip_stitch in next st sweet oddity art 5 feet make 2 with color b 1 make 6 single_crochet into a magic_ring= 6 2 increase in each st around= 12 3 single_crochet increase x 6= 18 4 single_crochet in each st around 5 single_crochet decrease x 6= 12 single_crochet the opening closed do not f/o 6 chain 1 turn bob st slip_stitch x 3 f/o and leave a long tail for sewing tail starting with color a leave a long tail for sewing before your chain chain 7 1 single_crochet in 2nd chain from hook and across= 6 2 chain 1 turn increase 4 single_crochet increase= 8 3 chain 1 turn single_crochet in each st across 4 chain 1 turn increase 6 single_crochet increase= 10 5-6 chain 1 turn single_crochet in each st across if you want a cleaner edge before starting the feathers single_crochet around the edges of the tail piece until you get back to a corner working the feathers make 5 feathers of each color color b and color c alternate between color b and color c for each feather start with color b feather chain 9 slip_stitch in 2nd chain from hook and across slip_stitch in next st f/o and weave in the tail ends head feathers attach color a yarn to top of head with a slip_stitch in the magic_ring feathers chain 7 work 3 half_double_crochet in 2nd chain from hook work a single_crochet in the next
